name: my-account
description: Data Broker sample UI for self-service account management.

scripts.clean: rm -Rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/app && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/vendor
scripts.copy-js: cd node_modules && cp systemjs/dist/system.js systemjs/dist/system.js.map es6-shim/es6-shim.min.js es6-shim/es6-shim.map zone.js/dist/zone.min.js reflect-metadata/Reflect.js reflect-metadata/Reflect.js.map platform/platform.js ../dist/vendor/
scripts.copy-assets: cd assets && cleancss -o ../dist/css/ubid-account.min.css css/ubid-account.css && cp -R img ../dist/ && cd ../node_modules && cp bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css ../dist/vendor/ && cp -R bootstrap/dist/fonts font-awesome/fonts ../dist/ && rm -Rf ../dist/fonts/4.4.0
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean lint-ts compile-ts bundle-lib bundle-app copy-js copy-assets
scripts.build-except-app: npm-run-all clean compile-ts bundle-lib copy-js copy-assets
scripts.jar: jar cvf my-account.war app dist index.html callback.html package.json system.config.js
scripts.prod: npm run build && rm `find ./dist -name *.spec.js*` && npm run jar
